nodes.text: The Capitol was the main government building in Lessu, the capital city of Ryloth. When the Separatists occupied Ryloth during the Clone Wars, Emir Wat Tambor used the building as his headquarters. Later, after the formation of the Galactic Empire, the building became the Empire's planetary headquarters. Opening on a large plaza, the Capitol also contained offices, detention cells, and a private hangar where Senator Orn Free Taa kept his personal shuttle.
